comment.author: 45184585@N04
comment._content: I had no idea they made color photochrom film this old. The quality is amazing.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: mrroey: Actually, these images are not color photographs, but are ink-based photolithographs. An explanation of the process to make these images, which originates with a black-and-white photograph and involves color lithography is partially explained here, and more completely illustrated and explained on the website for the Prints and Photographs Division here. I hope you find the details interesting!
